column1: |产品名称|产品型号|功能描述|

|네트워크 카메라 라이트|TC-C32XP|2MP Fixed Super Starlight IR Turret Camera，默认塑料外壳，M 为金属外壳，最高支持 1920x1080@30fps，S+265/H.265/H.264 编码，最低照度彩色 0.0008Lux@F1.6，智能红外，红外距离 30m，2 个暖光灯，15m，支持绊线和周界，内置麦克风、SD 卡插槽、复位按钮，工作温度-35℃~65℃，湿度 0~95%RH，POE，IP67|

column2: Dual IR Cut Filter with Auto Switch
Horizontal field of view:100.6°；Vertical field of view:56.5°
Saturation,brightness,contrast,sharpness,adjustable by client software or web browser
ONVIF(PROFILE S/T/G),SDK,CGI,Milestone,P2P(Mutually exclusive with Profile G)
Built-in MicroSD card slot,up to 512 GB
